abstract: In a shift, the financial sector was the only corner of the market in positive territory in late trading, as shares of companies like Google, I.B.M., Verizon and AT&T all declined.
snippet: In a shift, the financial sector was the only corner of the market in positive territory in late trading, as shares of companies like Google, I.B.M., Verizon and AT&T all declined.
lead_paragraph: A slump in technology and telecommunications companies pulled Wall Street lower on Monday, as two major market indexes carved new bear-market lows.

headline.main: Technology and Telecom Shares Send Markets Lower
headline.print_headline: Telecom and Tech Lead Markets Lower
